backend/main.mo: Manages a presale by tracking total ICP received, allocations, and per-address contributions with sorting and query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports describing background music behavior changes and the files involved.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for all frontend files related to the presale UI and background music system.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes with neon-style colors.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app composing presale sections, animated background, and the background music controller.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusic/: UI controller for background music handling play, mute, and volume with popover controls.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright and a caffeine.ai attribution link with tracking.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Displays aggregated contributor data in a table with timestamps and loading states.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: Shows a 24-hour countdown timer using the countdown hook.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Shows the deposit address with copy‑to‑clipboard interaction and confirmation.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Renders the hero section with an animated image, title, tagline, and three feature cards promoting the presale.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: Explains the three-step contribution process and lists presale details such as cap, currency, and token distribution timing.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Displays presale progress with a dynamic progress bar, ICP stats, and an ended badge using data from usePresaleStatus.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Combines countdown, presale parameters, progress bar, and deposit address into the main presale status section.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: Shows tokenomics details including supply and cap, plus a FAQ explaining the project and presale basics.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Defines presale constants including deposit address, cap, max supply, and polling interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Manages background music playback with autoplay handling, user preferences, gesture unblocking, and volume/mute controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Fetches and polls the list of presale contributors using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Implements a 24‑hour countdown timer that updates every second and returns hours, minutes, and seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Fetches presale status from the actor using react‑query with polling and conditional enabling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles plus custom neon-themed colors and animation utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/backgroundMusicStorag: Handles loading and saving user music preferences and opt‑in state in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates contribution records by address, summing amounts and sorting by latest timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats numbers with German-style dot thousands separators for ICP values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with extended neon color variables, animations, and theme customizations.
project_state.json: Describes project requirements, architecture notes, issues, and current feature state for the presale site.
